testcase.classname: Register | Users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: User could register with valid data successfully

testcase.classname: Login | User could use login functionality to use his account
testcase.name: User logins in with valid email and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to login page...............................................passed When User Enters "test26@example.com".......................................passed And user Enters "P@ssw0rd"..................................................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User Logins to the system successfully.................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | User could use login functionality to use his account
testcase.name: User Logins with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to login page...............................................passed When User enters "Wrong@example.com"........................................passed And user Enters "P@ssw0rd"..................................................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User could not login in to the system..................................passed
